video_prompt: Wind subtly rustles luminescent purple foliage. Warm golden light pulses from within metallic capsules, casting dancing glows. Magical dust motes drift and sparkle. A winding wooden staircase disappears into swirling mist, hinting at movement.
image_prompt: Whimsical treehouse integrated into a large, ancient tree with purple foliage. Spherical, metallic blue capsules with golden glowing windows and amber lights form living quarters. A winding wooden staircase connects levels. Small, feathery purple plants adorn ledges. Lush green grass with tiny purple flowers and a stone path at the base. Mystical forest background with sparkling light. Predominant colors: purples, blues, warm golds. Fantasy art, enchanting, peaceful, wonder.
refined_video_prompt: Luminescent purple foliage gently sways in a subtle breeze. Golden light dynamically pulses from within metallic capsules, projecting dancing glows onto surfaces. Magical dust motes actively drift and intermittently sparkle through the air. A winding wooden staircase gradually vanishes into an expanding, swirling mist.
